Pre-Game Insights: Steph Curry is set to play in the Golden State Warriors’ second game of the 2024-25 season against the Utah Jazz on Friday, despite being listed as questionable due to a right hip contusion.
Draymond Green, who sustained a right knee contusion, and De’Anthony Melton, who had discomfort from a chest contusion, were also upgraded to available ahead of the game.

Coach Steve Kerr discussed plans to regularly rotate 12 players, with Steph Curry acknowledging that the rotation would likely tighten as the season progresses but urged his teammates to maintain high energy and set aside personal egos for the team’s success.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Golden State Warriors vs. Utah Jazz game will take place on Friday, Oct. 25, at the Delta Center in Salt Lake City, Utah, and will be broadcast live on NBCS-BA and KJZZ. Fans will also have the option to live stream the game on the NBA League Pass and Fubo TV app and website.
